projects.title: Clarity Hub Infer API

frontmatter.title: Clarity Hub Infer API
frontmatter.description: NLP infer API to create and label utterances.

projects.contentRaw:
The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.

This API used the Universal Sentence Encoder (USE) to create embeddings from utterances, then used cosine similarity to find the most similar utterances to a given utterance.
projects.contentHTML:
The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.

This API used the Universal Sentence Encoder (USE) to create embeddings from utterances, then used cosine similarity to find the most similar utterances to a given utterance.
projects.excerptRaw: The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.
projects.excerptHTML: The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.

projects.title: Clairvoyance

frontmatter.title: Clairvoyance
frontmatter.description: Clairvoyance (renamed to Clarity Hub) finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

projects.contentRaw:
Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

Clairvoyance was built on AWS using S3, SNS, SQS, RDS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, and React. We created a webapp, extensions, and a microservice backend to bring real time suggestions to customer success agents using Intercom.
projects.contentHTML:
Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

Clairvoyance was built on AWS using S3, SNS, SQS, RDS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, and React. We created a webapp, extensions, and a microservice backend to bring real time suggestions to customer success agents using Intercom.
projects.excerptRaw: Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.
projects.excerptHTML: Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

projects.title: react-cornea

frontmatter.title: react-cornea
frontmatter.description: A testing utility for generating visual diffs of your React components.

projects.contentRaw: I made react-cornea to do image diffing of react components for CI/CD environments.
projects.contentHTML: I made react-cornea to do image diffing of react components for CI/CD environments.

projects.excerptHTML: I made react-cornea to do image diffing of react components for CI/CD environments.

projects.title: GILD Game

frontmatter.title: GILD Game
frontmatter.description: GILD is a 2 player game made in Meteor for Global Game Jam 2016.

projects.contentRaw:
GILD is a 2 player game. One person creates a Room, and the other player joins iit. Both players take turns summoning monsters using their given ingredients and having the mosnters fight. First to 3 wins is the victor!

(P.S. if you don't have anyone else to play with, you can access the site in two different browsers, or one browser using Incognito Mode).

The team that put this awesome game together in 48 hours was:

- Gustavo
- Ivan
- Lauren
- Daniela

Go team!
projects.contentHTML:
GILD is a 2 player game. One person creates a Room, and the other player joins iit. Both players take turns summoning monsters using their given ingredients and having the mosnters fight. First to 3 wins is the victor!

(P.S. if you don't have anyone else to play with, you can access the site in two different browsers, or one browser using Incognito Mode).

The team that put this awesome game together in 48 hours was:

  • Gustavo
  • Ivan
  • Lauren
  • Daniela

Go team!

projects.title: Space Kitty

frontmatter.title: Space Kitty
frontmatter.description: Space Kitty is a project generator for Meteor projects.

projects.contentRaw:
Space Kitty is a way of making projects.

The goal is to help you get from 0 to initial prototype and MVP as fast as possible.

Instead of wasting time learning about best practices, how to set up your router, get views set up correctly, browsing for the correct packages to use, and writing the same scaffolding code over and over again, Space Kitty takes care of all of that for you.
projects.contentHTML:
Space Kitty is a way of making projects.

The goal is to help you get from 0 to initial prototype and MVP as fast as possible.

Instead of wasting time learning about best practices, how to set up your router, get views set up correctly, browsing for the correct packages to use, and writing the same scaffolding code over and over again, Space Kitty takes care of all of that for you.
projects.excerptRaw: Space Kitty is a way of making projects.
projects.excerptHTML: Space Kitty is a way of making projects.

projects.title: Plipable

frontmatter.title: Plipable
frontmatter.description: It's like Soundcloud for Youtube. Your messages are automatically timestamped to where you initially wanted to post them!

projects.contentRaw:
I made Plipable to be a fun way to interact with videos.

Thanks to Youtube, there are tons of videos to watch and comment on. Special thanks to their API which made this all possible.

Shout out to Giphy. I just really, really like Giphy. Without them, commenting just would not be as fun as it is.
projects.contentHTML:
I made Plipable to be a fun way to interact with videos.

Thanks to Youtube, there are tons of videos to watch and comment on. Special thanks to their API which made this all possible.

Shout out to Giphy. I just really, really like Giphy. Without them, commenting just would not be as fun as it is.
projects.excerptRaw: I made Plipable to be a fun way to interact with videos.
projects.excerptHTML: I made Plipable to be a fun way to interact with videos.

projects.title: Font Matcher

frontmatter.title: Font Matcher
frontmatter.description: Pair up Google Fonts. Vote, favorite, and see the top pairs.
